title: How to Make a Churro Milkshake

steps.headline: Add ingredients into blender.
steps.description: Put milk, ice cream, vanilla extract and sugar into a blender.

steps.headline: Blend the ingredients.
steps.description: Once the ingredients are added blend on high for 1 minute until the mixture is smooth and free of any lumps.

steps.headline: Drizzle the caramel inside the glass.
steps.description: Before pouring the milkshake drizzle some caramel sauce on the inside of the glass for decoration and added flavour.

steps.headline: Pour into a drinking glass.
steps.description: Transfer the milkshake into a milkshake glass making sure it doesn't overflow.

steps.headline: Garnish the milkshake.
steps.description: Squirt some whipped cream on top of the milkshake and sprinkle some cinnamon onto the whipped cream. Top it all off by putting a churro into the milkshake.

steps.headline: Serve.
steps.description: Pop a straw in the milkshake and slurp away.

text: Add ingredients into blender. Put milk, ice cream, vanilla extract and sugar into a blender. Blend the ingredients. Once the ingredients are added blend on high for 1 minute until the mixture is smooth and free of any lumps. Drizzle the caramel inside the glass. Before pouring the milkshake drizzle some caramel sauce on the inside of the glass for decoration and added flavour. Pour into a drinking glass. Transfer the milkshake into a milkshake glass making sure it doesn't overflow. Garnish the milkshake. Squirt some whipped cream on top of the milkshake and sprinkle some cinnamon onto the whipped cream. Top it all off by putting a churro into the milkshake. Serve. Pop a straw in the milkshake and slurp away.
